name: Hakuoki: Warriors of the Shinsengumi
description:
Hakuoki: Warriors of the Shinsengumi is an action-adventure game based on the hit visual novel, Hakuoki: Demon of the Fleeting Blossom. Play as one of six legendary Japanese warriors and battle against the masses using deadly combinations, specials and more! Turn into a deadly fury and become unrivaled and unmatched in battle bringing utter destruction to your enemies!
At the close of the nearly 260 years of shogunate rule, Japan was at the brink of chaos. The Shinsengumi rose to prominence to bring order to society, but political intrigue and supernatural powers make their jobs that much harder. Follow two stories, Shinsengumi Memorial, an action-adventure take on Hakuoki: Demon of the Fleeting Blossom or Shinsengumi Chronicle, a story set in an alternate universe where the fate of the Shinsengumi plays out differently!
